messages.subject: Samurai Board Games....
messages.msgSnippet: forgive me if this sounds like an advert, but I just found a great site that is offering two great samurai games that have only been available in Japan for
messages.messageBody:
forgive me if this sounds like an advert, but I just found a great
site that is offering two great samurai games that have only been
available in Japan for twenty years.

The games (only w/ japanese instructions before) are now being
released (in pre-orders currently) by Multiman Publishing with
english rules for the first time. It takes 500+ pre-orders before
they start shipping (similar to GMT games).

The games are "Samurai Lords, the Wars of Feudal Japan," and "A Most
Dangerous Time, Japan 1570-1584."

www.multimanpublishing.com/preorder/viewGame.php?id=32

www.multimanpublishing.com/preorder/viewGame.php?id=34

www.multimanpublishing.com/preorder/preorder.php

I have read reviews of both japanese versions and they sound great.
I hope that this post will encourage others to order one or both of
the games (so I can get mine sooner!).

Enjoy!

Dan

PS. If anyone here has played these games before, please give us
your thoughts.
